actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Departments of the Treasury, State, and Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the importation of lottery materials for use in State lotteries.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to authorize the importation of printed paper that may be used as tickets, advertisements, or other lottery materials which is conducted by a State or is designed to be used in a lottery in a foreign country.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the importation of lottery materials for use in State lotteries.
